description: Here, we've included a collection of images we've generated over the course of a semester.

ExpandingLoops.title: Trivial loop and Siefert fibering
ExpandingLoops.caption: Continuous deformation of the trivial loop into other loops and the corresponding fibration

cos_animation.title: Trivial Fibering Animation
cos_animation.caption: Animation of trivial loop expanding to straight line

cos_animation_rev.title: Trivial Fibering Animation With Reverse
cos_animation_rev.caption: Same as Trivial Fibering Animation, straight line shrinks back to a point

NontrivialLoopRandomPath.title: Non-trivial loop
NontrivialLoopRandomPath.caption: Continuous deformation (rotation) of the curve and its corresponding fibration
